lead_paragraph: The martinis prepared by Christina Bini, an Italian mixologist, at Il Matto - Matteo Boglione's new TriBeCa restaurant, set to open in June at the old Arqua space on Church Street - will be served on the rocks. Actual rocks.
snippet: The Italian mixologist Christina Bini will be putting stones into martinis and creating drinks that look like gardens at the bar of the new restaurant Il Matto.

headline.main: Cocktails of the Italian Avant-Garde in TriBeCa
